overview_of_class: Diverse representations of historical, literary, and popular figures, such as the caudillo, the obispo, El Cid, Don Juan, the conquistador, the dictator, the gaucho, Simón Bolívar, Che Guevara, Evita, La Malinche, and Carlos Gardel.
name: Icons, Legends, & Myths in Latin American, Latino and/or Iberian Cultures
title: WCAS SPANISH 210-0-1 Icons, Legends, & Myths in Latin American, Latino and/or Iberian Cultures
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Diverse representations of historical, literary, and popular figures, such as the caudillo, the obispo, El Cid, Don Juan, the conquistador, the dictator, the gaucho, Simón Bolívar, Che Guevara, Evita, La Malinche, and Carlos Gardel.

subject: SPANISH
